name: Five Rooms
description: Five Rooms is a unique puzzle game that tells the story of a lonely traveler stuck between worlds and time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
